title: feat: auto-install OpenClaw and auto-onboard in setup script
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: The setup script now automatically installs OpenClaw and handles the full onboarding process, including configuration and daemon installation.
gist.impact: Users enjoy a streamlined 2-step setup experience instead of manual configuration, making it faster to get started.
gist.visual_concept: The OpenClaw project is represented by a cute pixel art crab. The automation is depicted as the pollinations.ai bee helping the crab build a structure or complete a checklist effortlessly.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee high-fiving a cute 8-bit crab character (OpenClaw) next to a completed checklist. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SETUP COMPLETE'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
